ygData.subject: RE: What are YOU wearing
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I ve updated my equip over the past couple of weeks. I have been going for the str, ac equip mainly. Ear:4str,2int Ear:same Head:Fine Silk Turbin
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I've updated my equip over the past couple of weeks. I have been
going for the str, ac equip mainly.


Ear:4str,2int
Ear:same
Head:Fine Silk Turbin 10ac,.3wt,10sv fire(or BI Crown if I am feeling frisky
:P)
Face:5dex,5cha,still have this old thing on, about to be 7str,7wis tho
Neck:Collar of Undead Protection,5ac,5sv poison and disease
Hands:Wus Fighting Guantlets(soon to be Treant Fist 3/4 pieces gotten)
Arms:Azure Sleeves 12 ac .6wt
Finger:Jagged Band, 3 str 5 ac
Finger:same
Wrist:Bracer of Erollisi, 5str 5ac wt 1.0
Wrist:Silverplated Bracer, 7ac 7sv poison and disease wt 1.0
Chest:Foremans tunic,10ac 3str,3wis 0.0wt
Shoulder:Cured silk
Legs:Drakehide leggings(soon to be gatorscale)
Feet:Cured silk(anything better than this)
Waist:Thick Leather Apron

Aeleon Leonheart
Level 34(halfway to 35 :P)
Innoruuk
